com.team09.qanda.esearch

Class ElasticSearchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team09.qanda.esearch.ElasticSearchHandler

  • public class ElasticSearchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with all of the communication with the elasticsearch server. It saves and loads questions if the user has a connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElasticSearchHandler()
      The default constructor passes in the information to start a connection with the server under the main index and type.
      ElasticSearchHandler(java.lang.String URL, java.lang.String Index, java.lang.String Type)
      And constructor with optional parameters to connect to a different server, index, or type.

    • Method Summary

      Shuts down the connection to elasticsearch

      Gets the list of questions stored on the server based on the url, index, and type passed to the constructor.

      Gets the questions stored on the server with optional parameters to specify the sorting and number of threads to return.

      Saves a question to the server.

      Saves a question to the server using a specific id

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElasticSearchHandler

        public ElasticSearchHandler()
        The default constructor passes in the information to start a connection with the server under the main index and type.

      • ElasticSearchHandler

        public ElasticSearchHandler(java.lang.String URL,
                            java.lang.String Index,
                            java.lang.String Type)
        And constructor with optional parameters to connect to a different server, index, or type. Used for testing so questions aren't pushed to the main index when tests are run.
        Parameters:
        URL - The URL of the server to connect to
        Index - The index within the server to reference
        Type - The type i the index to save to

    • Method Detail

      • getThreads

        public java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> getThreads()
        Gets the list of questions stored on the server based on the url, index, and type passed to the constructor. It returns a list sorted by most upvoted questions, which is the default sorting order, as well, it defaults to a list of 10 elements.
        Returns:
        An array list containing up to 10 questions sorted by upvotes

      • getThreads

        public java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> getThreads(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sort,
                                                      int numThreads)
        Gets the questions stored on the server with optional parameters to specify the sorting and number of threads to return.
        Parameters:
        sort - The type of sorting to be used
        numThreads - The number of questions to be retrieved
        Returns:
        An array list containing up to the requested number of questions in the requested sorting style

      • getThreads

        public java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> getThreads(java.lang.String query,
                                                      io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sort,
                                                      int numThreads)
        Gets the questions stored on the server with optional parameters to specify the sorting and number of threads to return, as well as a query to match
        Parameters:
        query - A string containing a specific query
        sort - The type of sorting to be used
        numThreads - The number of questions to be retrieved
        Returns:
        An array list containing up to the requested number of questions in the requested sorting style matching the given query

      • getThread

        public QuestionThread getThread(java.lang.String id)
        Gets a single question from the server based on its id. Used to obtain the latest versions of locally stored questions.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the question
        Returns:
        A question with the specified id, or null if one does not exist.

      • saveThread

        public boolean saveThread(QuestionThread thread)
        Saves a question to the server.
        Parameters:
        thread - The question to be saved
        Returns:
        True if the save was successful, false otherwise

      • saveThread

        public boolean saveThread(QuestionThread thread,
                          java.lang.String id)
        Saves a question to the server using a specific id
        Parameters:
        thread - The question to be saved
        id - The id to be used for the question
        Returns:
        True if the save was successful, false otherwise

      • saveThreads

        public boolean saveThreads(ThreadList tl)
        Goes through the questions stored in a ThreadList and saves them each to the server.
        Parameters:
        tl - The ThreadList object to save the questions from
        Returns:
        True if the save was successful, false otherwise

      • delete

        public boolean delete(Post P)

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> search(java.lang.String searchString)
        the search method queries the Elastic Search server for QuestionThreads based on the query provided by the searchString. The search method queries the question.text and answer.text field of a QuestionThread.
        Parameters:
        searchString -
        Returns:

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Shuts down the connection to elasticsearch
